page.title: 12SCHOOL LIFE-1
page.content: We are a class of{nine year old children. There are{thirty-three children{fifteen boys}and{eighteen {girls.}One of our{lessons}is{maths when we work with{numbers.}We{write them on{paper}with{pencils.}If we make a{mistake}we have to{rub}it out using a{rubber.}Somtimes we use{calcalators. We learned to{read}and{write}when we were{five.}In our{english lessons}we write{stories.}We learn how to make {sentences}and how to{spell correctly We learn to{understand}the{stories}we {hear}and{read.}If we do not know the {meaning}of a{word}or we can not{spell it we look it up in a{book}called a {dictionary.}A lot of time is spent on {project work}when we{learn about different{skills}by{visiting places and{talking}to{people.}We{record}what we have{learned}by{writing}and{ {drawing pictures}and making{models.
